name: FrontPage
headline: AI first stock trading platform for India
description:
FrontPage has built a community for financial market traders in India. The community has more than 1M monthly active users.

Now building a new stock trading platform for India, leveraging AI advances.

founders.name: Avijit Sharma, Founder
founders.description:
Founder & CEO. 
Active trader and investor in public financial markets for 10+ years. 15+ years in product management. Deeply interested in psychology, history, philosophy. 2x-Entrepreneur. Mechanical Engg from IIT Delhi.

The content provided on FrontPage is for informational purposes only and does not constitute financial advice, endorsement, analysis, or recommendations. The content is primarily user-generated and reflects the personal opinions and experiences of FrontPage community members. We strongly advise our users to conduct their own research or consult with a qualified financial advisor before making any financial decisions. FrontPage does not guarantee the accuracy, timeliness, or completeness of any information provided by our users and will not be held responsible for any decision made based on such information. It's essential for users to approach financial discussions and decisions with caution and skepticism. Avoid any financial strategies or investments that promise unrealistically high returns or sound too good to be true. Always ensure that any financial decision aligns with your personal financial situation, goals, and risk tolerance. We do not assume any liability with respect to any loss or damage, arising directly or indirectly due to any inaccuracy or incompleteness of any information or a breach of any warranty or guaranty due to the actions of any user of the Platform. About FrontPage
India’s #1 community of share market investors and traders: Find out what real share market investors and traders are saying about your stocks right now. FrontPage app has stock specific forums where you can discuss your existing trades or your planned future trade with fellow stock market traders. Socialize your trading idea to get more ideas or signals that you might have missed. Discuss outlook in stock specific forums and keep a tab on news that is moving the Indian stock & commodities markets.

Financial Content Disclaimer
The content provided on FrontPage is for informational purposes only and does not constitute financial advice, endorsement, analysis, or recommendations. The content is primarily user-generated and reflects the personal opinions and experiences of FrontPage community members. We strongly advise our users to conduct their own research or consult with a qualified financial advisor before making any financial decisions. FrontPage does not guarantee the accuracy, timeliness, or completeness of any information provided by our users and will not be held responsible for any decision made based on such information. It's essential for users to approach financial discussions and decisions with caution and skepticism. Avoid any financial strategies or investments that promise unrealistically high returns or sound too good to be true. Always ensure that any financial decision aligns with your personal financial situation, goals, and risk tolerance. We do not assume any liability with respect to any loss or damage, arising directly or indirectly due to any inaccuracy or incompleteness of any information or a breach of any warranty or guaranty due to the actions of any user of the Platform. About FrontPage
India’s #1 community of share market investors and traders: Find out what real share market investors and traders are saying about your stocks right now. FrontPage app has stock specific forums where you can discuss your existing trades or your planned future trade with fellow stock market traders. Socialize your trading idea to get more ideas or signals that you might have missed. Discuss outlook in stock specific forums and keep a tab on news that is moving the Indian stock & commodities markets.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: FrontPage**

Founded in 2019 and now part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, FrontPage is on a mission to become the go-to AI-driven stock trading platform for India. Based in Bengaluru and boasting a team of 24, the company started as a community for traders, amassing over 1 million monthly active users who connect to share trading insights and strategies.

**What Does FrontPage Offer?**

The essence of FrontPage lies in its ability to combine community-driven insights with cutting-edge AI technology. This unique blend allows traders to connect, discuss, and learn from one another while leveraging advanced AI features for stock trading. Whether you are an experienced trader or a beginner, FrontPage is designed to cater to your needs with stock-specific forums where trading ideas and signals are discussed actively.

The platform is yet to launch its full AI-powered trading capabilities, but it already provides complementary tools such as:

- **Trading Forums**: Places where users can ask questions, share trades, and discuss futures.
- **Market Heatmaps**: Visualize market dynamics and identify trends quickly.
- **Community Complex**: Engage with thousands of trades, charts, and insightful discussions from fellow investors.

**Backing and Development**

FrontPage has gained notable traction and backing from prominent investors, including Ashneer Grover (BharatPe), Kunal Shah (Cred), and others from the Y Combinator network. This backing not only provides credibility but also a wealth of expertise and resources to enhance the platform.

**Legal Disclaimer**

While the platform thrives on user-generated content and community sharing, FrontPage provides a crucial disclaimer emphasizing that its content should not be seen as financial advice, encouraging users to conduct their own research or consult financial advisors before making investment decisions.

**Join the Revolution in Indian Trading**

With a vision firmly set on building a community-driven yet technologically advanced trading experience, FrontPage encourages new users to join their growing network. They aim to make stock trading in India more engaging, insightful, and accessible. Explore more at [FrontPage](https://front.page).
